    • Method Detail

      • SetRootOperator

        public IOperator SetRootOperator(IOperator op)
        Description copied from interface: IQuery
        root operator is the last operator in query which makes results. some recursive commands go to this operator and then to its preceding operators. This method only set the operator as root and it should have been added before by AddOperator() method.
        Specified by:
        SetRootOperator in interface IQuery
        Parameters:
        op - root operator
        Returns:
        ref to root operator
